programmers_warning: Currently requires editing Amtrak GTFS to fix a problem with days of week.
title: Coast Starlight Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Coast Starlight
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at Seattle and Tacoma by Sound Transit,
at Portland by TriMet MAX and Portland Streetcar,
at Sacramento by Sacramento RT Light Rail,
at San Jose by Caltrain, VTA, and Altamont Corridor Express (ACE),
at Oxnard, Simi Valley, Van Nuys, Burbank, and Los Angeles by Metrolink,
and at Los Angeles by LA Metro.

Amtrak offers connecting buses from Emeryville to San Francisco.
